snippet.title: Migrating applications to the cloud requires a business service approach
snippet.description: Guest contributor Jeanne Morain outlines four steps of a business service approach to migrating applications to the cloud.

snippet.title: Building good business relationships isn't about going out for beers
snippet.description: Building relationships with the business is way more complicated than bonding over beers. Marc J. Schiller talks about the right way to do it.

snippet.title: Quiet noisy computer fans with a drop of oil
snippet.description: Don't let a poorly performing fan overheat your PC. Learn how to safely silence a noisy cooling fan and extend its life with a drop of oil.
